name: Silver-Tongued Scoundrel
text: Almost every scoundrel relies on their wit and their words to some extent, but you have refined them to a cutting edge. Your mouth is a sharper weapon than your sword, and you rely on it at least as much.

features.deceptiveAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also gain combat advantage against one enemy you can see until the end of your next turn
features.fast-talker(11thLevel): The first time you succeed on a Bluff or Diplomacy check in each encounter, one ally you can see gains a +5 power bonus to his or her next Bluff or Diplomacy check before the end of the encounter
features.deceptiveChallenge(16thLevel): You can roll a Bluff check or Diplomacy check in place of your standard initiative check

flavorText: If anyone had to catch me, good sir, Iâ€™m delighted it was someone of your abilities. Pray tell, how did you manage it?
